actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of small business investment companies electing to be taxed as regulated investment companies.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish special procedures for the treatment of dividends paid by small business investment companies which elect to be taxed as regulated investment companies.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the tax treatment of small business investment companies electing to be taxed as regulated investment companies.
